 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.String park(@RequestParam
                                                                                                                   java.lang.String qrCode,
                                                                                                                   @RequestParam
                                                                                                                   java.lang.String username)
        /parking/park endpoint - enables a user to park
        Parameters:
        qrCode - - qrcode scanned from entrance terminal (contains site and location info)
        username - - username of user parking
        Returns:
        - String representing success or failure of parking
